# Block all bots
User-agent: *
Disallow: /
Crawl-delay: 10

# Block AI crawlers
User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

User-agent: Claude-Web
Disallow: /

User-agent: anthropic-ai
Disallow: /

# Block major search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Disallow: /

User-agent: DuckDuckBot
Disallow: /
